raw_text: DIAS – DEVIKA (nee ABAYASEKARA) – Beloved wife of Chryshantha (Nestle PLC),​ loving daughter of late Roy and Pearl Abayasekara,​ darling sister of late Mohan,​ Suraj and Chandrika,​ darling aunty of Anya and Jonathan,​ Dilshara and Shannan,​ passed away peacefully on the 22nd of October 2023. Funeral Service will take place at 3.00 p.m. on Wednesday,​ 25th October at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour,​ followed by Burial at 4.00 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (Roman Catholic Section).068283
